name: Dark Tour
description:
This is a very long tour so take a seat and prepare to make your way through an abandoned small town in the Swampland. You will go through a desolate church, An overgrown Green house.  See inside old mansions as never seen before on Mobile. No jump scares just a nice tour. So kick back and relax  NO ADS!!!

Must have Cardboard or daydream to play.

Regards

~LyyNKx
